ModMetaData.name: Mind Altering Device
ModMetaData.author: IzzyHRC
ModMetaData.description:
Version 1.11
Are you sick of your personality? Are you being singled out because of the way you act? Don't think you can change?
Well you can now! With the Mind Altering Device!
Just step inside and BOOOM! You're a new person, ready to face the world.
Try it now!
